column1: Applied Artificial Intelligence and User Experience - MSc
column5: Learn to design and interrogate AI systems with a clear understanding of human behaviour. With the dependence on digital automation and remote working greater than ever, there is a huge demand for professionals with skills in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and User Experience (UX).We are the first UK university to offer a Master's degree bringing together AI, UX Research and Applied Psychology. As well as gaining a thorough understanding of Data and AI techniques, you'll explore theoretical concepts with practical applications.We teach you how to:
column7: Scottish students: £7,500 Rest of the UK/Republic of Ireland: £10,000 International: £17,000
